title: Member Profile Editing and API Improvements
content:
Introducing Member Profile Editing, empowering members to manage their directory listings.

Key features and updates:
* Significant API improvements
* Email verification using Firebase and Sendgrid
* Captcha using Cloudflare

title: Pasifika in Tech, a celebration for AANHPI Heritage Month
content:
We're thrilled to announce the success of our first-ever Pasifika in Tech Bay Area Happy Hour, co-hosted with several industry partners! The event showcased the vibrant Polynesian, Melanesian, and Micronesian tech community, fostering connections and amplifying Pasifika voices in the industry.

Highlights of the event:
* 80+ indigenous Pacific Islander and ally attendees
* Hosted at Twitch HQ in Downtown San Francisco
* Culturally-driven cuisine, creativity, and networking
* Representation from various tech companies including Amazon, Google, and Twitch
